text: The following is a list of notable people who were either born in, are current residents of, or are otherwise closely associated with or from the city of Coimbatore, India. C. S. Ratnasabhapathy Mudaliar, Coimbatore's transformational Municipal Chairman Samikannu Vincent brought the first theaters to South India. R. K. Shanmukham Chetty, India's first finance minister C. K.
